doc.title: Mongoose
doc.plot: A reporter for the local newspaper receives information about a corrupt business man, the media savvy man is popular around the city however this sinister character is willing to go to any length to profit, and thrives from others misfortune. When she exposes the business man in the local newspaper he disappears. The corrupt business man goes after the reporter and attempts to murder her by beating her and pushing her off a dam wall. The attempt goes wrong and both the business man and reporter end up going over the wall. The reporter awakes very dazed and when her memory returns she gathers her strength and takes revenge on the business man.
